How It Works

Re-Draft Your Team: This tool lets you rebuild your team's draft history from the first two rounds (2010-2024). Click on any alternative player to swap them with the actual pick and see how your redrafted team would look.

Color Coding: Green (Top 33%) Yellow (Middle 33%) Gray (Bottom 33%)

Top Available Players: For each pick, we show the best players who were drafted after that selection in the same year, sorted by their career performance. This shows which stars your team could have picked instead. Ranking players is subjctive, so it's a rough estimate based on available data.
